videos.headline: Jabari Small falls into the end zone for Tennessee TD
videos.description: Jabari Small pushes his way in for a touchdown from two yards out to give Tennessee the lead.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Jabari Small falls into the end zone for Tennessee TD) 2021/09/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kenny Pickett rolls out and hits Melquise Stovall for Pitt TD
videos.description: Pittsburgh ties the game at Tennessee as Kenny Pickett finds Melquise Stovall for an 11-yard touchdown pass.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Kenny Pickett rolls out and hits Melquise Stovall for Pitt TD) 2021/09/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Joe Milton III breaks off 54-yard run to get Vols to the 5-yard line
videos.description: Tennessee quarterback Joe Milton III finds an open lane and nearly gets to the end zone on a big run.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Joe Milton III breaks off 54-yard run to get Vols to the 5-yard line) 2021/09/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Pitt WR tosses touchdown pass on trick play
videos.description: Pittsburgh QB Kenny Pickett swings the ball to WR Jared Wayne, who tosses a 16-yard touchdown pass to Lucas Krull.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Pitt WR tosses touchdown pass on trick play) 2021/09/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Vols' Jimmy Calloway dodges 2 defenders on 44-yard TD catch
videos.description: Tennessee WR Jimmy Calloway breaks free along the sideline after making the catch and runs 44 yards for the score.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Vols' Jimmy Calloway dodges 2 defenders on 44-yard TD catch) 2021/09/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Pitt takes the lead as Vincent Davis powers his way to TD
videos.description: Pittsburgh's O-line helps Vincent Davis pound his way into the end zone on a two-yard touchdown run.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Pitt takes the lead as Vincent Davis powers his way to TD) 2021/09/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Pickett forces his way into the end zone on 4th-down QB sneak
videos.description: Kenny Pickett extends Pittsburgh's lead at Tennessee with a QB sneak on 4th-and-goal.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Pickett forces his way into the end zone on 4th-down QB sneak) 2021/09/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jacob Warren gets Vols back in it with 8-yard TD catch
videos.description: Tennessee QB Hendon Hooker finds Jacob Warren in the back of the end zone for an eight-yard touchdown pass.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Jacob Warren gets Vols back in it with 8-yard TD catch) 2021/09/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Pitt's Jordan Addison catches 5-yard TD for Panthers
videos.description: Kenny Pickett finds Jordan Addison on a slant route for a 5-yard touchdown to extend Pittsburgh's lead.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Pitt's Jordan Addison catches 5-yard TD for Panthers) 2021/09/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jaylen Wright gives Tennessee hope with 1-yard TD run
videos.description: Jaylen Wright caps a seven-play, 61-yard drive with a 1-yard touchdown to get Tennessee back within seven.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Jaylen Wright gives Tennessee hope with 1-yard TD run) 2021/09/11 ESHEET
